sentences.english: She planted little kisses across its forehead and it gurgled.
sentences.chinese: 她在它的額頭上吻了幾下，它咯咯地笑了。

sentences.english: Just as if some one was kissing the window all over outside.
sentences.chinese: 就好像有人從外面把窗子吻了個遍。

sentences.english: Surely the kisses of her bought red mouth were sweet;
sentences.chinese: 無疑地，買來的櫻脣之吻是如此甜蜜。

sentences.english: Retain the most memorable kiss, kissing the man failed to keep.
sentences.chinese: 留住了最刻骨銘心的吻，留不住接吻的那個人。

sentences.english: The Formosan landlocked salmon is the only salmon to live in a subtropical region.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣的櫻花鉤吻鮭是唯一生活在亞熱帶的鮭魚。

sentences.english: The bride was delighted, kissed him, and loved him with all of her heart.
sentences.chinese: 這時新娘非常高興，過來吻他，打心眼裏愛着他。

sentences.english: The two young guys' caressingspooning there are plain an eye-sore.
sentences.chinese: 看那兩個年輕人在那裏又摟又吻的真讓人看不下去。

sentences.english: He kissed her on the lips.
They all three blew him a silent kiss.
sentences.chinese: 她們三個人都向他飛了一個吻。

sentences.english: Our breathing grew more rapid as we kissed deeper and harder.
sentences.chinese: 當我們吻得越深越用力，我們的呼吸會越急促。

sentences.english: Deep or open-mouthed kissing is a very low risk activity in terms of HIV transmission.
sentences.chinese: 深吻或溼吻在HIV病毒傳播方面的風險非常低。

sentences.english: Your kiss, as if I fall into a sweet pink fruit basket.
sentences.chinese: 你的吻，將我甜在粉紅色果藍裏。

sentences.english: Her eyes were vair, And never closed when I kiss her.
sentences.chinese: 在我吻她時，她從不閉上毛茸茸的雙眼。

sentences.english: With her consent, you can also kiss her.
sentences.chinese: 徵得她的同意後，你還能吻她的脣。

sentences.english: I even asked him for a goodnight kiss.
sentences.chinese: 甚至，我向他索要一個晚安之吻。

definition: to hold in one's arms/to embrace
